text: Kasi nazali nde kokomela bino sikâ€™oyo mpo na koyebisa bino ete bozala lisanga moko te na moto oyo amilobelaka ete azali ndeko Moklisto, kasi atambolaka na bomoi ya pite to azali na lokoso ya mbongo to azali mosambeli bikeko to mofingi bato to molangwi masanga to moyibi. Bosengeli kutu te kolia mesa moko elongo na moto ya lolenge oyo.
